Header.title: We are Aperta
Header.paragraph: A decentralized Blockchain driven social platform promting free speech and privacy.

About.paragraph: we are a DAO concentrated on building a decnetralised, open and free platform to allow the internet to flourish in the era of web 3.0 and maximize it's potential to change the world to be a better place. the technologies.
Why2: we will be public owned and run
you can earn crypto by participating

Features.title: Peer-to-Peer chating
Features.text: you can chat with your peers with P2P end0to-end encrypted messaging with IPFS file sharing.

Features.title: Free Speech
Features.text: Say what is on your mind without the fear of being tracked or suppressed.

Features.title: Build a community
Features.text: Meet and befriend people like youa dn build a caring community to share and learn new things.

Features.title: Blockchain
Features.text: Send, recieve and donate crypto currency to other users
